title: Capitalization
description:
Checks if your page's content contains spelling mistakes, grammar errors, redundancies, and any other mistakes.

- Only proper nouns start with an uppercase character (there are exceptions for headlines).
recommendations: Fix the capitalization issues in your website's content
table: ...me About us Products Pricing Contact us **Sign** up Our company is amazing Welcome to ou...
...me About us Products Pricing Contact us **sign** up Our company is amazing Welcome to ou...

title: Redundant Phrases
description:
Checks if your page's content contains spelling mistakes, grammar errors, redundancies, and any other mistakes.

- Consider using “all the”.
recommendations: Fix the redundant phrases issues in your website's content
table: ...mpany's website. On here, you will find **all of the** latest and coolest tech gadgets the 198...
...mpany's website. On here, you will find **all the** latest and coolest tech gadgets the 198...
